input.sentences: this cruiseliner decided to stop at this coastal city .
small vacation houses lined the shores for people to sleep in after going to the beach .
geese were common to this area .
some of the townspeople owned boats that they took out on weekeneds .
the geese squawked as the vacationers enjoyed the sights .
output.sentences: The people on the boat are only stopping in for a day.
They don't see the beauty of the place I live.
They only judge it by the shoreline.
The harbor, the stone sidewalks, the things that make this town so picturesque and quaint.
I was once one of those people on the boat when I fell in love with this oceanside town. Now I feed the geese in the clear water and can't imagine living anywhere else.
